name: VKT Prime System Crash
description:
Alice Lorange, Alt.Lorange, Alex, Denis, Nuri, Taralise and Chiko…
They aren’t from the same worlds and, yet, they have the occasion to talk to each other, when they ended up captured...

Features

  • A short story written in Ren’py, staring characters from Mia’s previous works.
  • 2.362 words in total.
  • Fake crashes!
  • QTEs!!
  • And, of course, Steam Achievements!!!
  • Dual Language/Bilingual UI!
